channel.title: SML won't launch EA UPD3 with Area Actions
channel.description: After installing SML for UPD3, EA won't launch. I get a soft (quiet) crash from SML, Epic and the shortcut. I currently only have Area Actions installed. If I remove it and run Programmable Elevators EA does launch. SML and Programmable Elevators load properly. I tried a reboot.

item.title: SML won't launch EA UPD3 with Area Actions
